about_the_game:
The Wizard With a Gun OST offers more than 2 hours of music with 44 tracks composed by Ryan Ike. Available in .mp3 and .wav formats.

Also included is an in-game recipe for the Composer costume set.
detailed_description:
The Wizard With a Gun OST offers more than 2 hours of music with 44 tracks composed by Ryan Ike. Available in .mp3 and .wav formats.

Also included is an in-game recipe for the Composer costume set.
